body_html: @hunkim: I understand that your change is good, but by "Not at all" do you mean that you definitely haven't run the tests? I believe they will fail, since we have a backwards compatibility check that registered ops only get more permissive (ignoring the kernels).
body_text: @hunkim: I understand that your change is good, but by "Not at all" do you mean that you definitely haven't run the tests?  I believe they will fail, since we have a backwards compatibility check that registered ops only get more permissive (ignoring the kernels).
